name: Castlevania: Baleful Sonata
overview:
BEWARE!

Prepare Simon, to return to a place where nightmares are made. Castlevania has once again risen up from the ashes of that fateful night seven years ago to bring terror to the villagers of Transylvania. Burdened with the curse that the count had placed upon you before his demise, you must once again traverse the count's castle and bring his reign of horror to an end. Not only for the sake of those who depend on you but for the sake of your family line. What a terrible night to have a curse!
